column6: 모자람 없이 주신 사랑이 과분하다 느낄 때쯤 난 어른이 됐죠
column7: You gave me enough love and when I felt that it was too much I became an adult
column8: [sound:t2a-모자람 없이 주신 사랑이 과분하다 느낄 때쯤 난 어른이 됐죠.mp3]

column5: The appearance of someone or something looking good and beautiful.
column7: Look at me, I have bloomed prettily

column5: That part at the end of a plant stem that has a unique shape, color and fragrance or a plant that produces such a thing.
column7: I will make you walk only on flower paths
column13: Flower road is a common phrase
